content: pattern written in spreadsheet form crocheted in continuous spiral currently sized to fit my head 22 circumference it can be sized in increments of 6 stitches 2 by adding/subtracting increase rounds please let me know if you need different sizing 5-2-08 i ve added untested versions of the pattern for 14 and 18 head circumferences to the spreadsheet on my blog 5-1-08 errata round 23 should read *1 single_crochet in next 8 single_crochet 2 single_crochet in 1 single_crochet* 6 times 1 single_crochet in next **12 single_crochet** pdf has been updated pattern is for hat only band was knit using pattern from this lace headband 1 see details on my blog 2 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/lace-headband 2 http //stellarb wordpress com/2008/04/23/its-all-about-the-warm-fuzzies/
